Detailed Description

This class models the concept of priority for the control based scheduler. In this scheduler the priority is simply a short int with values ranging from 0 to PRIORITY_MAX-1, higher values mean higher priority, and the special value -1 reserved for the idle thread. Higher values of priority mean that the scheduler assigns a larger fraction of the round time to the thread.

bool miosix::ControlSchedulerPriority::validate (  )  const [inline]
Returns:
true if this objects represents a valid priority. Note that the value -1 is considered not valid, because it is reserved for the idle thread.
